screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Google search result for "latest video" with options to play videos from different sources, including YouTube and BBC. A pop-up is asking to open a link with either the Google Play Store or Chrome, with two buttons at the bottom for "Just once" or "Always."
action_think: The user has already attempted to play the latest video from the BBC and has been presented with an 'Open with' pop-up. Since the user request is to play the video, and the current screen shows the options to open the link with Google Play Store or Chrome, the next logical step is to choose one of these options to access the video.
action_plan: Choose the 'Google Play Store' or 'Chrome' option to open the video
action_result: The action of clicking on the "Just once" button has allowed you to open the video directly from the Google search results. This is a step towards completing the user request of playing the latest video from the BBC. However, you will need to repeat this action each time you wish to play the video.
